data.expected_result: No "You're viewing older messages" should appear as you're already on the one of the last messages sent
data.short_description: "You're viewing older messages" message appears even when you jump to the latest message using search
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a server and click on the magnifying glass - Give some parameters so that you see some recently sent results - Jump to a message in a channel you haven't been into since you started discord
